00048 void CelFileDataTest::FilenameTest()
00049 {
00050     std::string p1 = "CelFileMetaData";
00051         cfMeta->SetFilename(p1);
00052     std::string p2 = cfMeta->GetFilename();
00053     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p1 == p2);
00054 }

00132 void CelFileDataTest::AddAlgorithmParametersTest()
00133 {
00134         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00135         nvt.SetName(L"alpha1");
00136         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.004f);
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(cfMeta->AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt));
00138         
00139         // Check that the parameter
00140         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin, end;
00141         cfMeta->GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00142         std::wstring parameterName = ALGORITHM_PARAM_NAME_PREFIX;
00143         parameterName += L"alpha1";
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(begin->GetName() == parameterName);
00145 }
00146 
00147 void CelFileDataTest::GetAlgorithmParametersTest()
00148 {
00149         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00150         nvt.SetName(L"alpha1");
00151         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.004f);
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(cfMeta->AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt));
00153         nvt.SetName(L"alpha2");
00154         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.06f);
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(cfMeta->AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt));
00156 
00157         ParameterNameValueTypeVector algParams;
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(cfMeta->GetAlgorithmParameters(algParams));
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(algParams.size() == 2);
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(algParams.at(0).GetName() == L"alpha1");
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(algParams.at(1).GetName() == L"alpha2");
00162 }
00163 
00164 void CelFileDataTest::FindAlgorithmParameterTest()
00165 {
00166         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00167         nvt.SetName(L"alpha1");
00168         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.004f);
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(cfMeta->AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt));
00170         nvt.SetName(L"alpha2");
00171         nvt.SetValueFloat(0.06f);
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(cfMeta->AddAlgorithmParameter(nvt));
00173 
00174         ParameterNameValueType param;
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cfMeta->FindAlgorithmParameter(L"alpha2", param));
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueFloat() == 0.06f);
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cfMeta->FindAlgorithmParameter(L"bogus", param) == false);
00178 }
